Uses of Class
org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest.SimpleEvaluator

  • Packages that use SimpleEvaluator 
    Package Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest  

    • Uses of SimpleEvaluator in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest

      Methods in org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest that return SimpleEvaluator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addAlgorithm(LenskitAlgorithmInstance algo)
      Adds an algorithm to the TrainTestEvalCommand being built.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addAlgorithm(LenskitAlgorithmInstanceBuilder algo)
      Adds a fully configured algorithm command to the TrainTestEvalCommand being built.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(CrossfoldTask cross)
      Calls the CrossfoldCommand and adds the resulting TTDataSets to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(DataSource train, DataSource test)
      This constructs a new TTDataSet and passes it to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(DataSource source, int partitions)
      Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(DataSource source, int partitions, double holdout)
      Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand with the same name as its datasource and configures it before adding the datasets * to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(String name, DataSource source, int partitions)
      Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(String name, DataSource source, int partitions, double holdout)
      Constructs a new CrossfoldCommand and configures it before adding the datasets to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(String name, EventDAO train, EventDAO test, PreferenceDomain dom)
      This constructs a new TTDataSet and passes it to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addDataset(TTDataSet data)
      Adds a single TTDataSet to the TrainTestEvalCommand.
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.addMetric(TestUserMetric metric)
      Adds a completed metric to the TrainTestEvalCommand
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setOutput(File file)
      This provides a wrapper around TrainTestEvalCommand.setOutput()
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setOutputPath(String path)
      Creates a new file with the name and passes it to TrainTestEvalCommand.setOutput()
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setPredictOutput(File file)
      This provides a wrapper around TrainTestEvalCommand.setPredictOutput
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setPredictOutputPath(String path)
      Creates a new file with the name and passes it to TrainTestEvalCommand.setPredictOutput()
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setUserOutput(File file)
      This provides a wrapper around TrainTestEvalCommand.setUserOutput
      SimpleEvaluator SimpleEvaluator.setUserOutputPath(String path)
      Creates a new file with the name and passes it to TrainTestEvalCommand.setUserOutput()
